issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: The tests org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.aggregate.TestAggregates.testAggregates and org.apache.hadoop.record.TestRecordMR.testMapred fail intermittently with the problem "<path>/map_0000/file.out already exists".  There is a patch on HADOOP-1642 that should address the issue.
fields.summary: TestRecordMR and TestAggregates fail once in a while

comments.body: Attaching Adrian's patch https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12369042/HADOOP-1642-5.patch against this issue.

+1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12369959/2245.patch
against trunk revision r596835.

    @author +1.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    javadoc +1.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    javac +1.  The applied patch does not generate any new compiler warnings.

    findbugs +1.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs warnings.

    core tests +1.  The patch passed core unit tests.

    contrib tests +1.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Patch/1134/testReport/
Findbugs warnings: http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Patch/1134/artifact/trunk/build/test/findbugs/newPatchFindbugsWarnings.html
Checkstyle results: http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Patch/1134/artifact/trunk/build/test/checkstyle-errors.html
Console output: http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Patch/1134/console

This message is automatically generated.
I just committed this. Thanks, Adrian!
Integrated in Hadoop-Nightly #312 (See [http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Nightly/312/])

I'm reopening this after reverting the patch.

This patch can be significantly improved, especially the test-cases. Specifically it copies code from TestJobControl into JobControlTestUtils, for re-use, and yet doesn't remove the copied code from TestJobControl. It also introduced new compiler warnings, which somehow weren't caught by the patch-process. 

Overall, my bad, I should have been more careful while committing this.

I propose we commit the more crucial part of Adrian's patch i.e. the fix to {{LocalJobRunner}} (attached here) since that helps with the existing test-cases seem to fail and Adrian can fix the newer test-cases and submit that as a new patch. Thoughts?
I have already removed the duplicate code from TestJobControl and am working on the compiler warnings as we speak so you can either go ahead with the smaller patch or wait.
Sounds good, if you prefer so we can wait for the better patch.
Removed unused code in TestJobControl and made types more specific in TestJobControl to get rid of compiler warnings.
Same as previous patch plus the change to LocalJobRunner.java
Now with all discussed changes, tests passing etc. Code review please.
New patch now available incoporating Arun's feedback.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12370122/HADOOP-2245-5.patch
against trunk revision r597663.

    @author +1.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    javadoc +1.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    javac +1.  The applied patch does not generate any new compiler warnings.

    findbugs -1.  The patch appears to introduce  new Findbugs warnings.

    core tests +1.  The patch passed core unit tests.

    contrib tests -1.  The patch failed contrib unit tests.

Test results: http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Patch/1147/testReport/
Findbugs warnings: http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Patch/1147/artifact/trunk/build/test/findbugs/newPatchFindbugsWarnings.html
Checkstyle results: http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Patch/1147/artifact/trunk/build/test/checkstyle-errors.html
Console output: http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Patch/1147/console

This message is automatically generated.
No idea why contrib tests fail on this, ran them a few times here and they go just fine.
Integrated in Hadoop-Nightly #313 (See [http://lucene.zones.apache.org:8080/hudson/job/Hadoop-Nightly/313/])

The patch seems to have generated new Findbugs warning(s) but the Findbugs warning-link is not accesible from jira. I am going to resubmit the patch again. Adrian, could you please take a look at the Findbugs warnings.
Attempting to get hold of the Findbugs warnings.

The findbugs error is probably related to 

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-2272

which should now be fixed. So let's see what Hudson says... (all patches submitted since towards the end of last week that generated findbugs errors should also be resubmitted).
